AI Description: GlimmerHMM is a software system for gene prediction in microbial genomes. It uses hidden Markov models to represent various aspects of a gene (e.g., start codons, stop codons, and exons) to accurately predict the locations of genes.
Core Features: Gene Prediction In Microbial Genomes, Utilizes Hidden Markov Models, Predicts Start & Stop Codons, & Exons, Accurate Gene Location Prediction
General Tags: Gene Prediction, Microbial Genomes, Hidden Markov Models, Bioinformatics
